sub_tasks.requirements: Natural Language Understanding (NLU) Pipeline
Text Processing and Tokenization
Language-specific tokenizers (Whitespace, Jieba, MITIE, spaCy) with multi-language support
Text preprocessing and normalization capabilities
Feature Extraction and Representation
Dense feature extraction using pre-trained models (ConveRT, LanguageModelFeaturizer, spaCy)
Sparse feature extraction (CountVectors, Regex, LexicalSyntactic)
Pre-trained embedding integration (MITIE, spaCy)
Intent Classification System
DIET (Dual Intent Entity Transformer) unified architecture for multi-task learning
Multi-intent classification capability with confidence scoring
Fallback mechanisms and out-of-scope detection
Entity Extraction Engine
Named entity recognition with roles and groups support
Multiple extraction methods: rule-based (RegexEntityExtractor), ML-based (CRFEntityExtractor, DIETClassifier), and pre-trained models (SpacyEntityExtractor)
Entity synonym mapping and lookup table integration for normalization
Response Selection System
ResponseSelector for retrieval intents (FAQs, chitchat) with context-aware selection
Dialogue Management System
Conversation State Management
Tracker-based state management storing conversation events and context
Event-driven architecture capturing user inputs, bot actions, slot changes, and conversation milestones
Session lifecycle management and restart handling
Slot-based memory system
Typed slot system (text, boolean, categorical, float, list, any) with influence on dialogue flow
Configurable slot mapping mechanisms (entity, text, intent, trigger mappings)
Persistent state storage with configurable Tracker Store backends (InMemory, Redis, MongoDB, DynamoDB, SQL)
Lock Store mechanism for conversation-level concurrency control and race condition prevention
Policy-Based Action Prediction
Policy orchestration with priority-based execution allowing rule overrides
Rule-Based Policy System
RulePolicy for deterministic execution of fixed conversation paths and business logic
Form handling for systematic information collection with validation
Machine Learning Policies
TEDPolicy (Transformer Embedding Dialogue) for generalized conversation handling and multi-turn context modeling
MemoizationPolicy for exact pattern matching from training stories
UnexpecTED Intent Policy for out-of-scope detection and handling
Form-Based Information Gathering
Dynamic slot validation with custom mappings and unhappy path handling
Form activation, deactivation, and loop-based collection mechanisms
Action Execution System
Action Server Architecture
Custom Action Framework with HTTP-based communication and event-driven execution
Tracker and domain access for actions with external service integration capabilities
Action Server endpoint for connecting to independent custom action services
Built-in Default Actions
Session management actions (action_restart, action_listen, action_default_fallback)
Form and slot manipulation actions for conversation flow control
Response Generation System
Template-based response actions (utter_...) with variable substitution and conditional variations
Rich response support including text, buttons, images, and custom payloads
Channel-specific response formatting and adaptation
External NLG Server endpoint for delegated response generation
Domain Schema Definition
Central domain.yml schema defining assistant capabilities (intents, entities, slots, actions, responses)
Slot type definitions and mapping configurations
Response template definitions with metadata and variations
Training Data Management
NLU Training Data with examples, synonyms, regexes, and lookup tables
Dialogue Training Data
Stories for example conversation paths and ML policy training
Rules for fixed behavior patterns that override ML predictions
YAML-based training data format with validation and migration tools
Model Configuration System
NLU pipeline configuration with component sequence and hyperparameters
Policy configuration for dialogue management with priority settings
Graph Recipe format for complex, non-linear model architectures with custom components
Graph-Based Training Architecture
Component dependency resolution and execution graph management
Incremental training capabilities for model updates without full retraining
Model Storage and Deployment
Multi-backend model storage (local, S3, GCS, Azure) with remote loading capabilities
Model versioning and artifact management
Testing and Evaluation Framework
Automated testing suite (rasa test) for NLU performance, dialogue prediction, and end-to-end flows
Cross-validation and held-out test set evaluation with metrics reporting
Data validation (rasa data validate) for training data integrity and consistency
Channel Connector System
Built-in connectors for messaging platforms (Slack, Facebook, Telegram, Twilio, Webex)
Voice channel support (Twilio Voice, IVR) and custom website integration
Custom connector framework for extending to new platforms
HTTP API and Communication Layer
REST and WebSocket APIs for conversation management and model operations
Authentication and security (JWT, token-based) for API access control
Event Streaming and Integration
Event Broker endpoints for streaming to message queues (Kafka, RabbitMQ, SQL)
Asynchronous event processing and analytics integration
Command Line Interface (CLI)
Unified toolset for assistant lifecycle (init, train, interactive, run, data management)
Deployment and Scaling Infrastructure
Containerization support with official Docker images and Docker Compose configurations
Kubernetes and OpenShift deployment with Helm charts for production scaling
Monitoring and Observability
OpenTelemetry-based distributed tracing for performance monitoring and bottleneck identification
Conversational analytics with event-based data pipeline and BI integration
Marker-based conversation pattern detection and analytics
PII Management and Data Protection
Rule-based PII detection and anonymization in logs and event streams
Compliance-focused event stream anonymization
Secrets and Credential Management
HashiCorp Vault integration for secure credential management
Multi-tenant Architecture (Spaces)
Domain-specific conversation spaces with filtering and context switching
Space activation and tenant isolation mechanisms
